meanings.definition: People who do not play golf.
meanings.sent1: The park was full of nongolfers enjoying a picnic on the grass.
meanings.sent2: The golf tournament attracted both players and nongolfers to watch.
meanings.sent3: The nongolfers decided to have a mini-golf competition instead, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: In a sea of golfers, the nongolfers stood out like colorful flowers in a field.
meanings.sent5: The nongolfers cheered on their friends during the golf match, even though they didn't play themselves.

meanings.definition: Those who are not interested in golf.
meanings.sent1: The club welcomed both golfers and nongolfers to join their social events.
meanings.sent2: Some nongolfers prefer to spend their weekends hiking or biking instead.
meanings.sent3: The nongolfers jokingly called themselves the 'anti-golf squad'.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for painting made her one of the nongolfers in the group.
meanings.sent5: The nongolfers organized a movie night for those who preferred films over golfing.

meanings.definition: Individuals who do not participate in the sport of golf.
meanings.sent1: The resort offered activities for both golfers and nongolfers to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: During the golf lesson, the instructor noticed a few nongolfers observing from afar.
meanings.sent3: The nongolfers playfully challenged the golfers to a game of soccer instead.
meanings.sent4: Among the golfers, the nongolfers found solace in their shared disinterest in the sport.
meanings.sent5: The nongolfers explored the nearby trails while the golfers practiced their swings on the course.
